survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Electric Vehicle (EV) Public Charging Stations Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from electric vehicle (EV) owners regarding their satisfaction and experience with public EV charging stations.

questions.question_text: How often do you use public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format for clarity. Ensure options cover the full range of usage frequency.

script.question_text: How often do you use public EV charging stations?

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a public EV charging station? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format. This helps identify key priorities for EV owners.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a public EV charging station? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1.

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the availability of public EV charging stations in your area? (1 = Very dissatisfied, 5 = Very satisfied)
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement. Ensure the scale is clearly labeled.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the availability of public EV charging stations in your area? (1 = Very dissatisfied, 5 = Very satisfied)
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for public EV charging stations?

questions.question_text: Which charging networks do you primarily use? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to identify preferred networks. Include an 'Other' option for flexibility.

script.question_text: Which charging networks do you primarily use? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1.
